## Goal
Please write the goal of the task as follows::
- What is the goal?
- Why is the task necessary?

## Todo
Please write tasks as follows::
- [ ] foo
- [ ] bar

## Completion condition
Please write the completion condition of the task
(e.g. Merge PR)

## Note
Please write notes as follows::
- [ ] foo
